20logs.title: TUTORIAL - Get 20 logs
20logs.description: Everything requires sticks, so gather some wood

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great work. Get some tools for yourself and start slaying some enemies.

10enemies.title: TUTORIAL - Slay 10 Enemies
10enemies.description: You must get used to combat. So slay some enemies. Fighting gives you Combat XP

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Looks like you are getting stronger! Remember you are a gatherer, so butcher some animals

10farmanimals.title: TUTORIAL - Butcher 10 Farm Animals
10farmanimals.description: You must get used to gather food. Start with a farm.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good, now you won`t starve. Continue!

10combatlvl.title: TUTORIAL - Reach Combat Lvl 10
10combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 10.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

loot_gem.title: TUTORIAL - Loot a Gem
loot_gem.description: Pickup a gem from towers across Overworld or from Mobs

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: A shiny gem! You can use it to enhance your weaponry on a Smithing Table. Type /gems to find more.

crush_gem.title: TUTORIAL - Get some gem dust
crush_gem.description: Drop an anvil on gems to crush them into gem dust.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Crushed it! You can use the dust to craft tables for gems and affixes. Press U while hovering over it.

place_salvaging_table.title: TUTORIAL - Get a Salvaging Table
place_salvaging_table.description: Place a Salvaging Table. Craft it and use it to get materials.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Salvaging table placed. Time to recycle! Extract affix materials or even ingots.

place_simple_reforging_table.title: TUTORIAL - Get a Simple Reforging Table
place_simple_reforging_table.description: Place a Simple Reforging Table on the ground. Use it to upgrade items with affixes. Type /gems to find more.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Reforging ready. Enhance your gear!

first_affix_item.title: TUTORIAL - Get an item with Affixes
first_affix_item.description: Loot or either create an item with Affixes at the Reforging Table

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! These are all over the world. There are many variations, make sure to equip them to match your playstyle.

place_fortunas_anvil.title: TUTORIAL - Get a Fortuna`s Anvil
place_fortunas_anvil.description: Place a Fortuna`s Anvil on the ground. Use it to upgrade your items. Type /fortunas to find out more.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Fortuna`s anvil is set. Good luck!

use_fortunas_anvil.title: TUTORIAL - Upgrade an item on the Fortuna`s Table
use_fortunas_anvil.description:
+1 +2 +3 ... For upgrading the gear you need the item, catalyst to boost chance, material to improve gap and protection rune for protection of the item. 
Type /fortunas in case you get lost to find out more about the Fortuna`s Table

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing! Now let`s put your new gear to work to see how it behaves! Hunt down something!

craft_experience_cutter.title: TUTORIAL - Time To Extract Experience
craft_experience_cutter.description: Ever wanted to store Experience. You can craft an Experience Cutter to turn experience into orbes. Type /leveling to find out more.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing. Now you can use it to store your experience in a safe spot.

get_first_backpack.title: TUTORIAL - Get your beginer Backpack
get_first_backpack.description: Craft a Backpack so you can carry more items around. When equiped press B to open

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great. Now you can carry as much as you want. You can upgrade them aswell, tho with a price.

craft_bauble_mount.title: TUTORIAL - Get a Bauble Mount
craft_bauble_mount.description: Get yourself a Bauble for a Mount. Type /mounts to find out more.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great work! Now use that to capture a tamed mount.

use_bauble_mount.title: TUTORIAL - Your own personal mount
use_bauble_mount.description: Use the Mount Bauble to a tamed mob to make it yours. Type /mounts to find out more.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing! Now you can toggle your mount with the key V. Take care of it!

place_waystone.title: TUTORIAL - Get Yourself a Waystone
place_waystone.description: Place a Waystone on the ground. You can use those to travel vast distances at the cost of Experience

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! Interact with it. Maybe you can teleport somewhere.

get_tier_1_power_up.title: TUTORIAL - Get Yourself a Power Up
get_tier_1_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Nice. You can use that with Trimming Templates to enhance your armors.

50enemies.title: TUTORIAL - Slay 50 Enemies
50enemies.description: Test your new gear. Let`s see how strong you got.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: 50 enemies down! You`re a warrior now.

win_raid.title: TUTORIAL - Win a Raid
win_raid.description: Defeat a Raid upon a village. The more raids won, the more terrain you can claim.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Raid victory! The village is safe. Press K and go to Villager Hero to see if you can claim more terrain.

get_copper_backpack.title: TUTORIAL - Get a bigger Backpack
get_copper_backpack.description: Craft a Copper Backpack to carry even more items with you roadming the world.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Did you knew you can upgrade with a music box and play songs as you travel?

kill_bosses.title: TUTORIAL - Kill 4 Bosses
kill_bosses.description: Check out /dimensions to see how you can find bosses in each dimension.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Bosses defeated! Impressive strength. It is time to move towards other lands.

locate_gatekeeper.title: TUTORIAL - Find the Gate Keeper
locate_gatekeeper.description: Small hut with a special trader. The Gate Keeper holds the portal towards the next dimension.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Found the Gate Keeper hourse! Trade with him to get a Zeal Lighter

get_zeal_lighter.title: TUTORIAL - Get a Zeal Lighter
get_zeal_lighter.description: Trade with the Gate Keeper to obtain a zeal lighter. Use it to fire the portal that must lay near by.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Zeal lighter acquired. Light the way towards the Blue Skies!

20combatlvl.title: TUTORIAL - Reach Combat Lvl 20
20combatlvl.description: Everbright is for no weak souls. Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 20.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Level 20 reached for combat! Now you are ready for the Everbright
